animeDescription: After Ichiro Ogami's departure, the girls of the Paris Flower Defense Force are left debating who will be the next captain, while a centuries-old threat surfaces.   (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Fontaine, Erica', 'Bleumer, Glycine', 'Coquelicot', 'Carlini, Lobelia', 'Kitaoji, Hanabi', 'Raison, Mell', 'Caprice, Ci', 'Lilac, Isabel']
